title: Should I get Cassiopeia or Anivia?
body: I usually play mid, and I want to try out some new champions. I love both of these champions and I can't decide which one to get. So far I've been playing a lot of Ahri and Akali and sometimes Katarina.

replies.body: I find Cass's kit to be a lot more fun to play (you get to spam E whenever someone has poison on them) and her Ult is super situational, but when used effectively feels amazing. Anivia has a lot more utility with all her CC and you could try running her as a support.
Tried Anivia Support, not amazing. Until I realized you can have a Vayne pin against your wall. Grab a friend and if you time it right, you can pin literally anywhere you want :)

Depends on your play style, {{champion:34}}  is a much more relaxed and reserved champion compared to {{champion:69}} . {{champion:69}}  has this thing about pushing lanes really hard with the AOE damage to minions usually leaving her vulnerable to ganks, and fastbreak plays. If i had to chose id recommend {{champion:34}} , she's fun, has a strong kit, and nukes like no other. Also, you can't beat "*Egnivia"* in chat. 

Cheers
The best part is typing as many egg puns in all-chat while in Egnivia form!
Thanks guys!! This helped a lot!
Anivia has fantastic CC and combos, but I'm biased. She was my first champion.

I'm actually very much more of a fan of Anivia. She has a more intuitive and easier kit imho. Almost all of her dps is locked in her E, but she can still be quite useful late game with her utility (walls, slows). That and egg is just so hilarious sometimes.
Hmm, if you want more dps and long range harass you should go for cassiopeia, go for anivia if you wanna troll with walls and create a golden egg with hourglass :3
Both of them are good, albeit not really FotM right now. I think it is a lot easier carry with Cassiopeia, although she can be really hard to play.
